word: Many declare that it is certainly no harm to go to a concert and neglect the prayer meeting, or absent themselves from meetings where God's servants are to declare a message from heaven. It is safe for you to be just where Christ has said He would be. . . . Jesus has said, "Where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them." Matthew 18:20. Can you afford to choose your pleasure and miss the blessing?
